attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why should we have 2 pay 139 for watching tv when most have sky so we are paying 2 times .also so the  	
Digital switchover is coming so why should we pay bbc for this when other tv channels get there own money .we are 2008 now tine bbc get there own fund and not us to pay the fat cat for most of rubbish thay put on .
